channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Clairvoyant [Neutral Investigative]
channel.description:
The Clairvoyant [Neutral Investigative] Immune to conversion. Goal: Survive.
Passive: Focus Immunity to Occupation.
Day Ability: Visions (Infinite uses) You will learn of a target player's result at the end of the coming night. You won't receive a false result created by the Illusionist, or a result related to conversion. (e.g. you were attacked and healed, someone tried to occupy you but you are immune etc)
Night Ability 1: Aura Reading (Infinite uses) Compare the auras of two target players. You will know whether or not they are the same class type, and if they are, what class type they are.
Night Ability 2: True Sight (1 uses) Discover the factions of 2 players you have found to have the same class type. Which player belongs to which faction is specified.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Clairvoyant [Neutral Investigative]
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
You are valuable to other factions, providing information that currently no other class can through Visions, and the ability to over several nights be able to confirm who is of what faction if they match class type, or confirm that someone isn’t the class type they claim to be by checking them against someone confirmed. This is enough to have others allow you to assist them, working towards your goal of survival by being useful.
